item.title: Blazor .NET 8 and Minimal APIs Native AOT CRUD
item.description: Blazor .NET 8 and Minimal APIs Native AOT CRUD Let’s briefly discuss the key concepts involved in this Blazor app and Minimal APIs Native AOT CRUD implementation: Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables the development of single-page applications (SPAs) with the power of .NET. Minimal APIs: Minimal APIs is a new feature introduced in .
